themes: comparison of arts funding to sports funding
key_phrases: levels equal to their top-producing programs
if a university fully funds its football team, then its marching band should receive comparable support
equity in funding reflects equity in value
barriers_identified: preference for funding other disciplines (e.g., sports) over the arts
solutions_proposed: require school districts, universities, and community organizations to fund or seek funding for the arts at levels equal to their top-producing programs in other disciplines
equitable funding for arts programs such as marching bands when compared to sports teams
